name: Odysseas, Reclaimer of The Isles
description:
Odysseas, Reclaimer of The Isles is a short brawler / action game in which your world is getting invaded by Mech-like Aliens. You embody Odysseas, a knight without any weapons whatsoever to free your world of those Aliens.

As you don't have any weapon, you will be grabbing your ennemies and using them as your weapons of fortune.

The game's been made by a group of 5 Game Designers for a school project of almost 3 months : - Léonie RICHARD - Gabriel SOUSSI - Théo CARLUY - Guillaume COURCELAUD - Mana SELLIER (myself)
